name: Little Red (scitydreamer)
description:
This is an entry for My First Game Jam's Summer 2016 session, and it stars Little Red as she goes to visit her grandma. Said act involves fighting her way through some cursed woods.

This first version is playable, but there are definitely rough patches, as this game was my first attempt at learning how to make something in Game Maker.

Controls: WASD to move and arrow keys to shoot in a given direction; only four bullets can exist on screen at a time, so don't shoot willy nilly!
